Title: Chocolate Quinoa Bites
Ingredients: 1/4 cup unsweetened shredded coconut for coating
Instructions: In a small sauce pan, bring the quinoa and water to a boil. Cover and simmer until the water is absorbed (approximately 10-14 minutes)
In a food processor, process the almonds until evenly chopped
Add the dates, cooked quinoa, sea salt, peanut butter and chocolate morsels to the food processor
Process until the mixture forms a ball
Using your hands, scoop out the mixture and form into approx. 1-inch balls. You will have 12-14 balls
Roll each ball in the shredded coconut to coat
Refrigerate for approx. 1 hour to solidify
